fields.name: Test Source
fields.description:
Test source for integration testing with predictable data generation. 
This source will generate 4 data points, so that detection thresholds and subscription filters can be tested:
   - North Darfur: Conflict (0.9) and Food Security (0.9)
   - Blue Nile: Conflict (0.95) and Food Security (0.92)
fields.comment: Generates predictable test scenarios: Conflict Escalation, Food Crisis
